title: Moving charge - time proton spends in B-field

content.question: A proton moves to the right at an unknown speed. The proton enters a region containing a magnetic field of magnitude <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> pointing out of the page. The proton enters the region perpendicular to the boundary, as shown. If the proton exits the field on the same side of the region containing the magnetic field, how much time does the proton spend in the field?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 m sub p, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>p</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi m sub p, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>p</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 pi m sub p, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>p</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>
There is not enough information given to answer.

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator pi m sub p, and denominator e B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>π</mi><msub><mi>m</mi><mtext>p</mtext></msub></mrow><mrow><mi>e</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
